Subject: The story of Lightrade
Message-ID: <8rlrv8+6jbn@...>

X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: minime_316@...

Prebon smiled

"Than I shall tell you one. I will keep it short since we do not have 
much time. It was about 30 Earth years ago. I had just started The 
Trainers. It was myself, Hammer, Blaze, a bot named Blackstar, and 
than there was Lightrade. Lightrade was special. We were very close. 
He had been my best friend since I could remember. He and I always 
did things together, and kept together in the good times and the bad. 
We had been at war for awhile against another rogue faction named the 
Bultak, lead by our current Trainer Bullet. We were fighting over the 
Bultak's moon base, because it was very important to our domination. 
We finaly went all out and attacked. During the battle, Bullet 
damaged Lightrade immensly. There was nothing I could do to save the 
body. But the spark.....I stored it. I put it in a life-sustaining 
and have been keeping it all these years. I told him the first chance 
I got a fresh body, I would put his spark back. I would've put him in 
Striker's but Striker's spark was still there, it just needed 
programing. I made Bullet pay the ultimae price: I captured him and 
wiped his memory, making him join us. Eventually he started taking 
over Blackstar's work, and she didn't like that so she left us. We 
met Ignatius a few months later, and there we are. Our current 
Trau=iners. What do you think?"
